CustomField.description: Captures the maximum length of the product name for display. If the product name exceeds the specified length – it will be ellipsis display, else it will wrap the product name. The default length is 21 characters.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Captures the maximum length of the product name for display. If the product name exceeds the specified length – it will be ellipsis display, else it will wrap the product name. The default length is 21 characters.
CustomField.label: Product Display Max Length
